message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $230.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $230 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $190?
I really like the product, but $190 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150, which is the maximum I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at this price?
